CheckTitle: Ensure IAM Roles do not allow assume role from any role of a cross account
Description: Ensure IAM Roles do not allow assume role from any role of a cross account
Risk: If an IAM role allows assume role from any role of a cross account, it can lead to privilege escalation.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure IAM Roles do not allow assume role from any role of a cross account but only from specific roles of specific accounts.
